content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the marijampolė district court the court made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property between two parties identified as iv and jv the applicant iv has been granted the right to use and dispose of immovable property a car and a bull with a total value of eur 41516 the defendant jv has been recognized as having the right to use and dispose of agricultural land a car and a bull with a total value of eur 2144 the court has also ordered the defendant to pay the applicant a sum of eur 5000 as financial compensation the court referred to various articles from the civil code related to shared property and matrimonial property the court has granted the applicants amended application for the dissolution of the marriage division of property and payment of compensation the court has also allocated the costs of the proceedings
